item.title: Bill Belichick's legacy takes a detour at North Carolina
item.description: A season in, the legendary NFL coach's head-scratching decision to helm a lowly ACC team continues to confound.

item.title: Despite some lackluster offenses on Monday night, some 49ers and Panthers stood out
item.description: Eric Moody finds some silver linings in the inefficient play of QBs Brock Purdy and Bryce Young on Monday night.

item.title: Free agent pickups: The players you need for a playoff push
item.description: All the free agent options worth adding as we look ahead to Week 13.

item.title: CFP Bubble Watch: Who's in, who's out, who has work to do in each league
item.description: Trying to make sense of the constantly evolving playoff picture, conference by conference.

item.title: Projecting the College Football Playoff top 12 after Week 13
item.description: We assess how the committee could stack the top teams in the country.
